AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mischievous
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mischievous child. However, she was loved as an unlikable fellow who sometimes used her wiles to solve problems.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Disciplinarian
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] trained to protect the city in which she lived. She handled various weapons, such as swords and guns, and accumulated knowledge of combat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Informed Person
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to learn about different things. As she listened to the stories of the different tribes she traveled with growing up, she amassed knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cult child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family that believed in a cult based on the power of legacy faeries. She trained daily to enhance her ability to manipulate her own destiny.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of blacksmiths. Every day she saw the various articles her parents made.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farmer's child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of farmers. While growing up, she actually helped raise crops and livestock.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Servant training school students
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] attended a school that trained servants of various species. She eventually learned what she needed to know to deal with different situations.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] entered the battle as a warrior because she wanted to protect someone. She trained every day to protect her friends.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recognized for her talents and worked as an architect. Her quick construction helped people in need of a home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a miner to dig for ore that was in demand. She would finish the job digging for more ore than others, and her co-workers often asked her for tips and tricks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a farmer. She found joy in raising vegetables and livestock, and before she knew it, she was earning huge profits.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Blacksmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the maker of weapons and artifacts used by the LegacyFaeries. Some people are amazed at her quick blacksmithing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Servant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served a different tribe as a servant. Through various tasks such as health care, he acquired a wide range of knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: LegacyFairy Spy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a spy because of her quick movements. She was an excellent spy, stealing several pieces of information.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Slave Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child born of a slave legacy faerie. She was separated from her mother at an early age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sold Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted for some reason and sold to a slave trader of a different race. Whenever she made a mistake, the trader would whip her.
